1.content: Pick any one of these
1.title: Choose your creature

11.content: Once upon a time there was a teenage giantess named Amber. She was a witch and so her parents sent her to hogwarts. Unfortunly for her smaller classmates(and teachers} the castle had been enlarged to giant size so amber would be able to fit and feel normal. One day amber was walking to one of her classes when she saw a tiny (to her) guy trying to get into a class due to the fact that everything was amber's size. What does she do?
11.title: Giantess Student

111.content: Amber is a nice giantess so she picks up the boy who has jet black hair and opens the door and puts him down and he says thank you giantess he then says hi i'm harry potter amber says hey harry potter i'm amber thats when he looks at her and instantly falls in love.with amber.well its nice to have met you HP i got to go to my classes.
111.title: Meeting harry potter

1111.content: Amber first class was potions so she headed down into the dungeons where a tiny guy with an evil look was at the front desk she thought he must be the teacher. amber sat down in her seat and students appeared and all the boys were looking at her because amber was very very pretty but not a veela even the teacher severus snape was looking up at her in a love look. And then he said lets begin working on growing spells while they were working a pale white boy came up to amber he was tiny to her and he said hello freak amber is in griffyndor amber got mad and poked draco which to him would hurt severus snape didnt do anything because he was in love with amber and instead said to draco say sorry to amber. a great silence overcame the place snape was known for favouring his house students however he didnt favor this time and then a teacher asked for amber to come with her amber got up and went with her when they got where they were going which was the quidditch field which to amber was very tiny amber said whats with this field the teacher said quidditch field i am enrolling you in quidditch amber says why the teacher said you are a giant and we need a second seeker so we thought of you amber amber says oh but i need a broom the teacher shows amber a broom called the DragonRider made especially for giants this is the fastest broom there is. later amber went out with oliver wood to train amber caught every ball and wood said yes we are going win for sure. amber went back to the dorm. what happens next?
1111.title: Amber's first class: Potions

11111.content: Amber went to a greenhouse which to her was big to her classmates it was gigantic they said whoa amber said what ? looks normal to me when she spotted harry talking to a red headed kid and a red headed girl she walked over to them and the red headed guy she walked over to harry and the students and said hi harry whos your friends and then the red haired guy looked at amber and fainted amber said why did he faint he is in love with you amber said WHAT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I HATE DATING amber said ron woke up ad got scared amber said sorry i just got mad at that is k harry and his friends say.
11111.title: Amber Does Herbolgy

14.content: Do you want a robot, or do you want more choices?
14.title: Robot or more?

145.content:
A couple more options.

A giant spider.

An amorphous shapeshifting mass of bees, usually human shaped (so they can wear the uniform) but can change to other forms. Will have a single hive mind.
145.title: Even more spider, man of bees, others
